verbs.description: liquidize (third-person singular simple present liquidizes, present participle liquidizing, simple past and past participle liquidized)

entries.meaning: to make liquid usually referring to solid food in a food processor; liquefy.
examples: To make the soup, you should first liquidize the carrots to remove lumps..

entries.meaning: (business, finance) to convert assets into liquid (cash) form; to liquidate
examples: The store needs to liquidize its stock so it can pay its creditors.
